reviewText: My son loves this dvd. Im looking forward to buying more dvds in the near future... thank you so much
Bought this DVD for my granddaughter. She watches Daniel on  PBS and will now be able to watch in the car. She loves it!!!
My granddaughter loves Daniel Tiger even though she is only 2 years old. Will have to get some more soon.
My daughter and I LOVE Daniel Tiger. (Mommy might actually love him more.) He is very relatable for preschoolers and it easy to discuss with your child the topics of the episodes.

I grew up watching Mr. Roger's Neighborhood and liked the train sets and his calm demeanor. This show is based off of that series and is geared towards the toddler - preschool age group (2-5). This DVD specifically addresses feelings and emotions. Although I tend to like this DVD more than my 2.5 year old son, I gave it 5 stars because I think the value of expressing his feelings and learning to put them in words will become something he's more comfortable with the older he gets.
Great.
Daniel Tiger is such a good role model for my 3 1/2 yr old grandson!  He likes to watch, and these are simple stories that teach how to handle emotions like anger.
My little guy (2.5) loves this DVD and I think it has helped him process certain feelings - especially missing loved ones when they leave.
love Daniel Tiger
Very nice video and excellent for our 3 year old.  Arrived in good time and in great condition.
Our five year old approves.

My kids love this show so much. And I really like the different lessons and take-away messages from the different shows.

This set will make your kids use the words "Frustrated" and "Jealous" and "Sad" to describe how they are feeling, so it's best to follow up with actual discussion over not using the words just to get attention when they really are in need of some stimulation. That's the only issue we've had! My own fault.
My son loves it so much. So glad I got this for him.. best show for kids.
One of my kids favorite shows
I love Daniel Tiger videos for young children! I wish there were more videos. My kids have watched all the episodes so many times.

Fantastic. My 3 1/2 yr old son actually sings the little songs he learned from this DVD about dealing with feelings. One day I told him I was frustrated because I couldn't find my keys, and he sang Daniel Tiger's song: "When you're feeling frustrated, take a step back, and ask for help."  Then he helped me look for them. Great teaching tool about dealing with sadness, frustration, jealousy, etc.
We aparently needed this, they love it. Great for the 2-5 crowd.

We are HUGE Daniel Tiger fans in this house!  Both my 4 yo with Autism and my 2 yo love Daniel and frequently sing the songs during play or during conflict situations.  This particular DVD has been very helpful for my 4 yo when needing to adjust to major life changes, such as the birth of a younger sibling (feeling jealous) or the school year ending (feeling sad).  It's also been helpful in general for frustration tolerance.

I don't have a favorite. The series are all spectacular in creative and clever writing.
My Granddaughter sings all the songs and knows all the words. So cute !!!
son loves it
OK
Product arrived timely and as described.
just what the children want.
My 2 year old loves this DVD.
Of course anything about Daniel Tiger is great so I gave it 5 stars just because of that.
perfect!
Daniel is the man
Super good
Most entertaining. Kept 4 and 3 yr old glued on moving day. A very good thing.
Came in very fast and is one of my nephews favorite cartoons! Can't wait for him to see it and enjoy it!
My son loves it !! He started learning good behavior from Daniel ;)
My child loves Daniel tigers neighborhood the episodes are great for teaching children everyday things and how to deal with their emotions
Baby girl loves Daniel and has been watching him from 3 months old. Now at 8 months, this DVD keeps her quiet while we are on the road.
Love it!
Really liked this movie help my 4 year old with feelings when she get mad and sad now she sings the little jinggles for the feelings it awesome
Helps a child identify and name "new feelings" and be able to share appropriately.  All the beloved characters from Mr. Rodgers neighborhood.
Great dvd. My 2yr old loved it and learned at the same time. Still watch it now. Just be prepared to have it memorized
This is a great series. All of the Daniel Tiger episodes have a lesson with a little song. My one year old and three year old both really enjoy watching this show!
Same as the other videos, helpful and easy to understand. Great for the little ones when they have tough times.
Met my expectations.!
It was scratched
Another Daniel Tiger winner!  All my grandchildren love DT and can't get enough of these simple and entertaining lessons.
Love it!
perfect buy
3-year-old nephew can't get enough!

Our 2.5 year old loved watching this DVD on a recent flight.  She adores Daniel and will watch and re-watch episodes.  From  a parent's perspective, you can't go wrong with choosing sweet Daniel.  Daniel sets a good example and the show teaches appropriate lessons.  I personally love that the stories are not loud or overly silly.

I love that I am now able to purchase Daniel Tiger on DVD. The DVD has multiple episodes on it which includes:
-Duckling Goes Home
-Daniel Feels Left Out
-Daniel Gets Frustrated
-Frustration at School
-Daniel is Jealous
-Jealousy at the Treehouse
-Someone Else's Feelings
-Empathy at School
Now keep in mind if you are at all familiar with Daniel that there are two stories in one episode so really there are only 4 actual episodes. Daniel always makes it easy for children to relate and is able to teach life lessons in a child friendly way. I'm so glad they decided to do a continuation of Mr. Roger's Neighborhood!
Love it, my son loves his Daniel Tiger

My Grandson Jude, loves his Daniel Tiger.
 I do wish however these videos came in seasons, instead of just one story :(
Happy, but did not realize it celebrates the holidays as costume day, thank you day and snow flake day. It never mentions Halloween, Thanksgiving or Christmas specifically.
We watch and read Daniel every night.  It's nice to have some DVDs so I don't have a DVR full of Daniel Tiger.
love the charachter

I love Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood, I purchased this particular one as it helps children understand the concept of empathy. I know I can watch Daniel FREE on Netflix, Amazon Prime, and PBS but I bought this film for on the go use when the TV or iPad/iPhones are not available, or simply no WIFI. Also for when my son stays at the hospital, because of his medical condition. I love this DVD it is worth to purchase, it is super inexpensive and a great gift. I am not sure what to say more about it besides, buy it!
excellent
This DVD saved our life on a 10 hour car trip.
My granddaughter loves it, she is 3
awesome my daughter loves it
Awesome movie my daughter loved it and we received it through the mail very quickly!!
Thanks
My 22 month old daughter loves this!  She cant get enough of Daniel Tiger.  Teaches good lessons and has catchy songs.
My 12 month old  grandson loves it! Great for entertaining him while driving to the lake!

My little bug loves Daniel Tiger.  She sings along with the small lessons.  I watch them with her so that we can "speak the same language".  These shows help us talk about disappointments and happiness and fear.  All great lessons for my little 3 and a half year old.
My girls love Daniel Tiger and can now watch in the car making car rides much more enjoyable.

My daughter loves Daniel tiger. I am so happy that he has finally come out on DVD!! i hope there are more to come.. she learns so much from each episode on this dvd a nice safe and clean show.. we love it
My child loves this show!!! It's a great show for teaching about manners and just life lessons in general! It's also completely age appropriate!!
I love how much my kid is leaning from this show, he can't get enough of Daniel. He watches it over and over again.

We have never watched Daniel Tiger online, but have heard good things.  I bought this DVD of multiple different shows for a trip and my daughter (3.5) LOVES it!  She was singing the songs afterward.  It was a good motivator for us to talk about her feelings and how to deal with them.
Great price, and exactly what I was looking for

I should actually say my son loves it.  Since first discovering Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood, my son talks about nothing else.  I got this video along with the Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood Life's Little Lessons and they are huge hits.
Love it!
great movie my grandaughter loves it
Very good.
My granddaughter loves her Daniel Tiger videos, with multiple stories & her favorite characters from PBS!

My 3-year old loves this show, and has learned so much from the episodes. It's a sweet, caring show and teaches important lessons about different feelings we all can have, and has catchy songs to go along with them! I highly recommend this show.
My son loves Daniel Tiger. We watch him on the Kindle Fire with Amazon Prime but I wanted a dvd to send to the sitters house. Great lessons for life that are easy for toddlers to understand.
Great video! I wrote another review for the Life's Little Lessons. Both videos are awesome. It's a great way to teach kids empathy, conflict resolution, and frustration tolerance.

For toddlers, I can't think of a better show than this one. It's a great show to teach kids about all kinds of things without the main characters being whiny or complaining. The way they incorporate easy little songs into their lessons are great. I hear my daughter singing them around the house so I know she's getting the right things out of each lesson. lol.
Worked out great.  My granddaughter loved this video.  I would recommend this to others.  I love the stories and feelings portrayed.

I love Daniel Tiger for my almost 3 year old, but I guess having one dvd about big feelings is maybe not the best idea because my son was so sad after the first two episodes he didn't want to watch anymore!

My two year old loves Daniel and with the big graphics and catchy songs that teach about emotions and practical things like "going to the potty", the show is wonderful. Just like Mr. Rogers (RIP) this is a wholesome children's program and his legacy lives on.
My 2 year old daughter will ONLY watch this show. I am so glad she is obsessed with such a great show. Highly recommend. The jingles get stuck in your head but they are super cute life lessons.
My daughter loves it very much. We own many Daniel tigers on iTunes but it is nice to win one on dvd.
I was so glad when PBS finally released DVD for this show! Keeps my son entertained for hours. He loves it! Item came quick was in brand new condition. Great purchase!!
The grand kids absolutely love the Daniel Tiger series. It is so cute to watch them demonstrate what they have learned

I first discovered Daniel Tiger's neighborhood on TV and my 2.5 year old immediately took a liking to the show.  I decided to buy the DVD for my car and now she watches it every day on her way to school.  I love that the show teaches them real life lessons in the form of a catchy, short, and easily memorized song.  My daughter and I both find ourselves singing the songs even when we aren't watching the show.  Highly recommend.
Cute series.  Worthy continuation of Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood's characters.
Love these episodes!
Has good ways for children to learn how to deal with their different feelings and emotions.
This item is as described and did the job that I purchased it to do. I would buy from this seller and/or product again.
Short sets of videos for my daughter.
Worked great at first but now keeps freezing in my kid's portable dvd player.  Its the only DVD that freezes, others work fine the player.
I recently introduced my two year old to Daniel Tiger. I really love how Daniel Tiger teaches so much about life, and feelings. Parents could even learn from these shows.
Grandkids love Daniel Tiger.
I just love Daniel Tiger. This is my daughter's favorite DVD.
Such good material for kids.  My girls sing the little jingles and remind me to reset my bad moods!
